T02D3770:160b-1: sarba dharmma p'a la ba lin ta bi dhi:/
T02D3770:160b-3: chos skyong thams cad pa'i gtor ma'i cho ga / dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3770:160b-4: bsod nams tshogs sogs bar chad zhi //
T02D3770:160b-5: phrin las rnam bzhi 'grub pa dang //
T02D3770:160b-6: chos kyong thams cad mnyes par 'gyur //
T02D3770:160b-7: de phyir gtor ma'i cho ga rtsom //
T02D3770:160b-8: dad dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa pos //
T02D3770:160b-9: snying rje che zhing gzhan phan dga' //
T02D3770:160b-10: ser sna med cing gtor brtsams pas //
T02D3770:160b-11: gsang ba'i btung ba lcags kyu rnams //
T02D3770:160b-12: nya dang khur ba 'bras chan rnams //
T02D3770:160b-13: la phug la sogs bza' btung rnams //
T02D3770:160b-14: brtson pas nye bar tshogs pa na //
T02D3770:160b-16: dben zhing gtsang ba'i sa phyogs su //
T02D3770:160b-17: dbang chen dkyil 'khor rnams lngas gyur //
T02D3770:160b-18: de steng pad snod mdzes pa'i nang //
T02D3770:160b-19: sngar bsags rdzas kyis yongs su dgang //
T02D3770:160b-20: byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed la //
T02D3770:160b-22: de stengs 'bar ba gru gsum bsam //
T02D3770:160b-23: 'bru gsum steng du pad snod bsam //
T02D3770:160b-24: rlung bskyod me 'bar rdzas rnams zhu //
T02D3770:160b-25: thog mar nyi ma shar lta bu //
T02D3770:160b-26: de nas sbyang dang sbar rtogs ni //
T02D3770:160b-27: zla ba rdo rje aom gyis bsgrub //
T02D3770:160b-28: ye shes bdud rtsis sangs rgyas sogs //
T02D3770:160b-29: 'bad pas de nyid thim par bsam //
T02D3770:160b-30: sku gsung thugs kyis byin brlab bya //
T02D3770:160b-31: rang snying sa bon 'od zer gyis //
T02D3770:160b-32: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhing rnams na //
T02D3770:160b-34: chos skyong srung ma thams cad rnams //
T02D3770:160b-35: mdun gyi nam mkhar spyan drangs la //
T02D3770:160b-36: thog mar zhal bsil bsang gtor bya //
T02D3770:160b-37: de nas me tog sogs lnga mchod //
T02D3770:160b-38: rjes su gtor ma dbul ba ni //
T02D3770:161a-0: rdo rje thal mo'i steng bzhag @161a * //
T02D3770:161a-2: dad pa'i blo yis kun la bstabs //
T02D3770:161a-3: thams cad dgyes pa'i thugs kyis ni //
T02D3770:161a-4: ljags kyi myu gus drangs gsol bsam //
T02D3770:161a-5: aom sarba dha rmma p'a la //
T02D3770:161a-7: aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dha rmma n'am a'a
T02D3770:161a-8: dya nu tpa nna tv'a ta aom a'a:h'um phat sv'a
T02D3770:161a-11: sarba me ba sha na ya ho: //
T02D3770:161a-12: sarba du sht'a na m'a ra ya h'um phat ces brjod la dbul bar bya'o //
T02D3770:161a-13: de nas gsol gdab las bcol bya //
T02D3770:161a-14: phyogs bcu'i zhing khams mtha' yas na //
T02D3770:161a-15: bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub sems //
T02D3770:161a-16: gnyis med thugs rje'i dbang gis ni //
T02D3770:161a-17: dpal dang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs su sprul //
T02D3770:161a-18: 'bar ba'i sku rnams khro gtum che //
T02D3770:161a-19: rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs mthu stobs ldan //
T02D3770:161a-20: rab zhi 'od gsal thugs chud kyang //
T02D3770:161a-22: dpa' bo dpa' mo'i tshogs rnams la //
T02D3770:161a-24: sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung du gsol //
T02D3770:161a-25: bdag cag sgrub pa po rnams la //
T02D3770:161a-26: zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod kyi //
T02D3770:161a-27: phrin las rnam bzhi'i dngos grub stsol //
T02D3770:161a-28: sgrub la bar chad byed pa yi //
T02D3770:161a-29: dgra bgegs thams cad zhi bar mdzod //
T02D3770:161a-30: bsod nams tshogs chen bsags las byung //
T02D3770:161a-31: rgyal chen bzhi dang phyogs skyong bcu //
T02D3770:161a-32: lag na rdo rje gos sngon tshogs //
T02D3770:161a-33: gzhan yang mthu rtsal che ldan pa'i //
T02D3770:161a-34: lha dang lha min mi 'am ci//
T02D3770:161a-35: lto 'phye grul bum nam mkha' lding //
T02D3770:161a-36: sha za srin po phra med tshogs //
T02D3770:161a-37: sman dang btsan la sogs pa yi //
T02D3770:161a-38: chos la dga' ba'i dge bsnyen rnams //
T02D3770:161a-39: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs song nas //
T02D3770:161a-40: bstan pa bsrung bar khas blangs pa'i //
T02D3770:161a-41: dge bsnyen pho mo thams cad la //
T02D3770:161a-42: bsnyen bkur gtor ma rgya chen dbul //
T02D3770:161a-43: bstan pa gnyen po bsrung du gsol //
T02D3770:161a-44: bdag cag sgrub pa po rnams la //
T02D3770:161a-45: rang rang las kyi dngos sgrub stsol //
T02D3770:161a-46: dkon mchog gsum gyi bka' nyon la //
T02D3770:161a-47: rnal 'byor kun gyi las bcol sgrubs //
T02D3770:161a-48: log 'dren thams cad tshar bcad nas //
T02D3770:161a-49: kun kyang dam tshig la gnas te //
T02D3770:161a-50: rtag par tshogs gnyis rab bsags nas //
T02D3770:161a-51: 'phags pa rnams kyis brnyes pa yi //
T02D3770:161a-52: rab zhi bde chen thob par shog //
T02D3770:161a-53: yi ge brgya pa brjod la aom a'a:h'um badzramu:/
T02D3770:161a-54: zhes pas thams cad gshegs su gsol //
T02D3770:161a-55: gtor ma sum mdo'am bzhi mdor sa gtsang sar bskyal lo //
T02D3770:161a-56: chos skyong thams cad pa'i gtor ma'i cho ga slob
T02D3770:161a-57: dpon chen po ba lim a'a tsaryas mdzad ba rdzogs
